max_log_files.description: The maximum number of log files that will be stored in the log directory

launch_roblox_after_setup.description: This setting decides whether Roblox should launch after exiting the modloader menu

auto_install_roblox_updates.description: This setting decides whether Roblox should automatically update when an update is available

roblox_reinstall_after_changes.description: This setting decides whether Roblox should reinstall after selecting a different mod profile

discord_rpc.description: This setting decides whether or not discord rich presence will be used

default_launch_arguments.description: This setting decides what the default launch arguments for this program should be
